snippet.title: The Thaumaturge | 11 Facts Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist now: http://re.11bits.com/gdf
📕 Last chance to dive into the world of #TheThaumaturge before its release on March 4. 
Here are 11 facts about the game. Learn about the mystical art of thaumaturgy and the dangers of taming wild salutors on the dark streets of 1905 Warsaw.

0:00 An RPG in a Unique Setting
0:30 The Game's Main Protagonist
0:53 Fascinating World of Warsaw 1905 AD
1:16 The Art of Thaumaturgy
1:35 An Unusual Family Heritage
1:59 The Salutors
2:22 The Unique Character Development
2:40 The "Sixth Sense" of a Thaumaturge
3:00 Challenging Turn-Based Combat
3:19 Shape the Outcome of the Story
3:38 A Slavic Flavour
